NeedDef.label: Gauss Energy
NeedDef.description: Gauss Energy is the amount of remaining power this Necron has remaining, it is what keeps them alive. If a Necron runs out of Gauss Energy, they will die unless they have a sarcophogus available and marked as theirs. If they have a sarcophogus they will teleport to itin an emergency situation that could potentially cause them death, regardless of cause, as long as their teleport module is intact.
